attributes.additional_details: There is no reason for the "turn a blind eye" policy, and no reason to allow Brothels, or Saunas to exist in Scotland Capital city.  Remove, Ban or Criminalise these brothels, which are shamelessly littered throughout Edinburgh, and restore some decency to our streets.

rejection.details: This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website. http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
